title: Understanding Heavy Drinking
text: Heavy drinking is defined differently for men and women. Consider the number of drinks consumed per week.

title: Binge Drinking Definition
text: Binge drinking is also a factor in determining heavy drinking. It involves consuming a large number of drinks on a single occasion.

hintAnswer: eight or more drinks per week for women and fifteen or more drinks per week for men
title: Weekly Drink Limits
text: What is the weekly drink limit for women and men that defines heavy drinking?
choices: eight or more drinks per week for women and fifteen or more drinks per week for men
for men, drinking five or more standard alcoholic drinks on one occasion, and for women, this refers to drinking four or more standard drinks on one occasion
problematic behavioral or psychological changes (e.g., inappropriate sexual or aggressive behavior, mood lability, or impaired judgment) that develop during or shortly after alcohol ingestion

hintAnswer: binge drinking on five or more of the previous thirty days
title: Binge Drinking Frequency
text: How often does binge drinking need to occur to be considered heavy drinking?
choices: binge drinking on five or more of the previous thirty days
for men, drinking five or more standard alcoholic drinks on one occasion, and for women, this refers to drinking four or more standard drinks on one occasion
problematic behavioral or psychological changes (e.g., inappropriate sexual or aggressive behavior, mood lability, or impaired judgment) that develop during or shortly after alcohol ingestion
